revised_title: Biological and Ecological Aspects of Nitrogen Fixation by Free-Living Micro-Organisms
tldr: This article discusses the biological and ecological aspects of nitrogen fixation by free-living micro-organisms, focusing on blue-green algae and heterotrophic nitrogen-fixing bacteria. It explores the environmental factors affecting nitrogen fixation, such as energy sources, oxygen levels, and soil conditions. The article also highlights the importance of these micro-organisms in soil fertility and their role in the ecosystem.
